name: Digital Museum of Varietas et Resciscendi
name_original: Digital Museum of Varietas et Resciscendi
description:
Digital Museum of Varietas et Resciscendi is a pretentious museum name for a non-pretentious museum.

While parts are 'in construction', you can take students or your kids (or just yourself) through a virtual museum to look at a variety of art pieces!

Follow my ko-fi, twitter, or youtube channel for further updates, as there will be more!

Watch the video below for how to play, especially if you're new to video games!

Note: The price is name what you want! I don't want anyone who can't pay to feel guilty about not paying. The goal of this project is to create an experience that's accessible to as many people as possible!

And if you can pay? I'd certainly appreciate it as all payments either here, or on ko-fi, help continued development!
